course_description: Continuation of Japanese 101. Students will learn vocabulary, expressions, and sentence structures to become able to meet basic communication needs in Japanese. All four skills (speaking, listening, reading, and writing) will be incorporated, and accurate and appropriate language use will be emphasized.
prerequisites: JPN 101 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 7152, Section #: 9000, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Staff, Status: Closed
